title: X Rebirth: Home of Light Complete Edition (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_x_rebirth_2.0.0.2.exe"
- Run "setup_x_rebirth_home_of_light_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Run "setup_x_rebirth_teladi_outpost_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: X REBIRTH: HOME OF LIGHT COMPLETE EDITION
Genre: Simulation - Action - Sci-fi
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10), Mac OS X (10.9.0+) and Linux (Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17)
Languages: Audio and text: Deutsch, English, franÃ§ais. Text only: ä¸­æ–‡, italiano, í•œêµ­ì–´, Ñ€ÑƒÑÑÐºÐ¸Ð¹
Features: single-player - achievements - controller support
Released: February 25, 2016
Company: Egosoft / Egosoft
Company: ConcernedApe / ConcernedApe 
Store page: https://www.gog.com/game/stardew_valley

About:
X Rebirth: Home of Light Complete Edition includes X Rebirth and two expansions: X Rebirth: The Teladi Outpost and X Rebirth: Home of Light.

In the distant future, the X universe faces a period of profound and irrevocable change. While the universe stumbles towards an uncertain future, countless adventures await as new enemies rise in search of power. Enter a young adventurer and his unlikely female ally traveling in an old, battered ship with a glorious past - two people alone against the galaxy, playing a key part in the events to come. The fate of the universe rests in your hands..
X Rebirth represents a spectacular new beginning for the X series, offering loyal fans and newcomers alike a vast, vivid and extremely detailed universe to explore throughout the game. Varied gameplay elements such as action-packed space combat, detailed trading mechanics and high-speed space exploration with fast travel allow players to experience a truly unique space saga that will keep them hooked for dozens of hours. X Rebirth features a whole new user experience - it is easier than ever to start with, and remains as deep as fans expect it.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP SP3 (64-bit) / Vista (64-bit) / 7 (64-bit) / 8(64-bit)
Processor: Intel i-Series at 2GHz or AMD equivalent
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GT400 series with 512MB RAM or better, ATI 4870HD with 512MB RAM or better
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 8 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card 

Recommended system requirements - Windows: 7 (64-bit)
Processor: Intel i5 (Quad) or i7 at 2.5GHz or AMD equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GT500 series with 1GB RAM or better, ATI 5870HD with 1GB RAM or better
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 12 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card
